title: Chicago's modern architecture
creator_credit: George Barford, Egons Tomsons and International Film Bureau
brief_description: A comprehensive look at Chicago’s modern architecture. Covers the Chicago school, modernism and post-modernism and shows the way in which the post modernists attempt to revive classical architectural features. Includes works by Sullivan, Richardson, Wright, Burnham and Root, Jeny, Van der Rohe, Yamasaki and Elmut Jahn.
